title: St. Louis Source Base (DISCONTINUED)
notes:
Updates of this series will be ceased on December 19, 2019. Interested users can construct a proxy by summing Currency in circulation (H.4.1 release); Service Related Balances and Adjustments (H.4.1 release); and Reserve Balances with FR Banks (H.4.1 release). The discontinued series plotted on the same graph with the calculated data can be accessed for comparison here (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/graph/?g=p6WY).
For more details, see the FRED Announcement (https://news.research.stlouisfed.org/2019/12/discontinuance-of-st-louis-monetary-base-and-reserves-data/).
